abstract: Our reading list includes items about an important engineer leaving Twitter, Microsoft focusing on scientific computing and Facebook privacy — of course.
snippet: Our reading list includes items about an important engineer leaving Twitter, Microsoft focusing on scientific computing and Facebook privacy — of course.
lead_paragraph: The tech editors and reporters of the The New York Times began this week with reading about a Twitter loss, a Microsoft strategy and the HP-Palm back story — and of course, about Facebook privacy settings too.

headline.main: What We’re Reading: Strategy and Back Story

abstract: About 14 years after its initial release, Hotmail is getting revamped in a way that Microsoft claims will make people give it a try again.
snippet: About 14 years after its initial release, Hotmail is getting revamped in a way that Microsoft claims will make people give it a try again.
lead_paragraph: At this point, Microsoft must have developed its own seminar for employees called something like Apologizing With Optimism: How to Persuade People to Give You Another Try.
